mapper.insert: insert into weather (id, time, country, city_id, city_name, lon, lat, zip_code, create_date, modify_date, deleted, data) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lon,jdbcType=REAL}, #{lat,jdbcType=REAL}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{data,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
